Package mystars.forms

Interface IUserInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConsoleGraphicUserInterface
    public interface IUserInterface
    This interface manages the respective forms for the operation of MySTARS.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.Integer getInt​(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String description)
      Displays form requesting for integer input from the user

      Displays form requesting for text input from the user

      Displays form requesting user input for setting the access period

      Displays dialog with specified title and message requesting user confirmation

      Displays a list of courses with the given title

      Displays form requesting user input for creating a lesson

    • Method Detail

      • renderLoginForm

        LoginResponse renderLoginForm()
        Displays login form
        Returns:
        LoginResponse containing user input, or null if the form is closed without any input

      • renderStudentMenuForm

        StudentMenuResponse renderStudentMenuForm​(java.util.List<Registration> regs)
        Displays list of options that a student can perform to manage courses. A list of courses that the student is currently enrolled/on the waitlist for is also displayed. If the student is currently not registered for any courses, they will not have the option to drop/change/swop indexes.
        Parameters:
        regs - List of courses that the student is currently in.
        Returns:
        Selected option, or null if the form is closed without any input

      • renderAdminMenuForm

        AdminMenuResponse renderAdminMenuForm()
        Displays admin menu with list of things the admin can do
        Returns:
        Selected option, or null if the form is closed without any input

      • renderIndexSwopForm

        IndexSwopResponse renderIndexSwopForm()
        Displays form requesting user input for swopping indexes
        Returns:
        User input, or null if the form is cancelled/closed without any input

      • renderItemSelectorForm

        TextResponse renderItemSelectorForm​(java.lang.String title,
                                    java.util.List<java.lang.String> items)
        Displays a generic form requesting that the user select one of items
        Parameters:
        title - Title to label form with
        items - List of items that can be selected
        Returns:
        Selected item, or null if the form is cancelled/closed without any input

      • renderCreateStudentForm

        CreateStudentResponse renderCreateStudentForm​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> genders,
                                              java.util.List<java.lang.String> nationalities)
        Displays form requesting user input for creating a student
        Parameters:
        genders - The list of genders that a student can assume
        nationalities - The list of nationalities that a student can assume
        Returns:
        User input to be used to create a new Student, or null if the form is cancelled/closed without any input

      • renderCreateCourseForm

        CreateCourseResponse renderCreateCourseForm​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> schools)
        Displays form requesting user input for creating a course
        Parameters:
        schools - The list of schools that a course can belong to
        Returns:
        User input to be used to create a new Course, or null if the form is cancelled/closed without any input

      • renderCreateIndexForm

        CreateIndexResponse renderCreateIndexForm​(java.lang.String course)
        Displays form requesting user input for creating a course index
        Parameters:
        course - Parent course name to be displayed on the form
        Returns:
        User input to be used to create a new Index, or null if the form is cancelled/closed without any input

      • renderCreateLessonForm

        CreateLessonResponse renderCreateLessonForm​(java.lang.String index,
                                            java.util.List<java.lang.String> lessonType,
                                            java.util.List<java.lang.String> days)
        Displays form requesting user input for creating a lesson
        Parameters:
        index - Parent index number to be displayed on the form
        lessonType - The list of lesson types that the lesson can take.
        days - The list of days that the lesson can be conducted on.
        Returns:
        User input to be used to create a new Lesson, or null if the form is cancelled/closed without any input

      • renderAccessPeriodForm

        AccessPeriodResponse renderAccessPeriodForm​(java.lang.String curAccessPeriod)
        Displays form requesting user input for setting the access period
        Parameters:
        curAccessPeriod - Current access period to be displayed on the form
        Returns:
        User input containing new access period, or null if the form is cancelled/closed without any input

      • renderCourseManagementForm

        CourseManagementResponse renderCourseManagementForm​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> courses)
        Displays form with list of courses and request for the user to select an action to perform on a course
        Parameters:
        courses - List of courses that can be managed
        Returns:
        Selected option, or null if the form is cancelled/closed without any input

      • renderIndexManagementForm

        IndexManagementResponse renderIndexManagementForm​(java.lang.String courseCode,
                                                  java.util.List<java.lang.String> indexes)
        Displays form with list of indexes and request for the user to select an action to perform on an index
        Parameters:
        courseCode - Course code to display in the form title
        indexes - List of indexes that can be managed
        Returns:
        Selected option, or null if the form is cancelled/closed without any input

      • getText

        java.lang.String getText​(java.lang.String title,
                         java.lang.String description)
        Displays form requesting for text input from the user
        Parameters:
        title - The form title
        description - The form description
        Returns:
        User input, or null if the form is cancelled/closed without any input

      • getInt

        java.lang.Integer getInt​(java.lang.String title,
                         java.lang.String description)
        Displays form requesting for integer input from the user
        Parameters:
        title - The form title.
        description - The form description.
        Returns:
        User input, or null if the form is cancelled/closed without any input

      • renderDialog

        void renderDialog​(java.lang.String title,
                  java.lang.String msg)
        Displays dialog with specified title and message
        Parameters:
        title - The dialog title.
        msg - The dialog message.

      • renderConfirmation

        boolean renderConfirmation​(java.lang.String title,
                           java.lang.String msg)
        Displays dialog with specified title and message requesting user confirmation
        Parameters:
        title - The dialog title.
        msg - The dialog message.
        Returns:
        true if the user confirmed, or false otherwise

      • renderStudentList

        void renderStudentList​(java.lang.String title,
                       java.util.List<Student> students)
        Displays a list of students with the given title
        Parameters:
        title - The title of the form.
        students - The list of students.

      • renderCourseList

        void renderCourseList​(java.lang.String title,
                      java.util.List<Course> courses)
        Displays a list of courses with the given title
        Parameters:
        title - The title of the form.
        courses - The list of courses.

      • renderIndexInfo

        void renderIndexInfo​(java.lang.String title,
                     java.util.List<Index> indexes)
        Displays a list of indexes with the given title
        Parameters:
        title - The title of the form.
        indexes - List of indexes to display

      • renderIndexChangeConfirmation

        boolean renderIndexChangeConfirmation​(java.lang.String title,
                                      java.lang.String description,
                                      java.lang.String labelA,
                                      Index indexA,
                                      java.lang.String labelB,
                                      Index indexB)
        Display detailed information about two indexes and request for the user to confirm an action
        Parameters:
        title - Title of the form
        description - Description to be shown on the form
        labelA - Text to label indexA with
        indexA - First index to display
        labelB - Text to label indexB with
        indexB - Second index to display
        Returns:
        true if the user confirmed the action, or false otherwise

      • renderRegisteredCourses

        void renderRegisteredCourses​(java.lang.String title,
                             java.util.List<Registration> regs)
        Display a list of courses and their individual lessons
        Parameters:
        title - Title of the form
        regs - List of Registrations to display
